snippet.title: Gotham Knights - Official 4K Gameplay Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Watch the first #gameplay walkthrough of #GothamKnights in #4K.
 
Get a glimpse of open-world Gotham City where #Batgirl and #Robin join forces to take on #MrFreeze in one of several Villain encounters found within the city. They’ll use a variety of abilities, weapons, and unique combat moves to neutralize their foes.

Learn more: http://go.wbgames.com/GothamKnights

Connect with Gotham Knights online:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/GothamKnights
Facebook: https://facebook.com/GothamKnights
Instagram: https://instagram.com/GothamKnights
Discord: Discord.gg/GothamKnights 

Official WB Montreal Channels:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/WBGamesMTL
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wbgamesmtl/
